subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady was sacked four times and threw one critical interception Sunday against the Jets. He marched the Patriots to a late touchdown that trimmed the lead to 3 points, but could not finish off another comeback.
snippet: Tom Brady was sacked four times and threw one critical interception Sunday against the Jets. He marched the Patriots to a late touchdown that trimmed the lead to 3 points, but could not finish off another comeback.
